== Puthur (CT) (627853) ==

Puthur (CT) is a town in the [[Thrissur]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 15.44 sq. km. and harbouring 4295 households with total population of 17430 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 12 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 305 km. Male population is 8605 and female population is 8825. Scheduled Caste population is 1892 and Scheduled Tribes population is 108. Census Location Code of the town is 627853<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 12 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 75 km. Railway station is at Thrissur at a distance of 12 km.
